So the server status page is to update you if there is anything wrong with there servers. Now the problem is there server status page doesn't actually check to see if the server is online or not. The only time that it says the server is down is A) when they manually switch it cause of a known patch or B) when the LAN connections between it and the computer in the same building lose there connection to each other. So realistically what the server status pages is for is just to let you know when they patch or have a power outage.
